# Your definitions here.
# They will be imported in the module 'user'.

import numpy as np

def mandelbrot(i,j2):
	x = 0*i + 0*j2
	c = (i+1j*j2)
	z = c
	for i in range(20):
		z = np.multiply(z,z) + c
	x[np.where(np.abs(z)>0.00001)] = 255
	return x

def julia(i, j2, real=-0.8, imag=0.156):
	x = 0*i + 0*j2
	c = real+1j*imag
	z = (i+1j*j2)
	for i in range(100):
		z = np.multiply(z,z) + c
	x[np.where(np.abs(z)>0.00001)] = 255
	return x
